items.sentence: Is there any chance that Tom will be at tonight\'s party?
I don\'t think we should tell Tom we\'re going to Boston.
If you go to bed dressed like that, you\'ll catch a cold.
I would\'ve been unable to do that if you hadn\'t helped.
Tom told me that I should spend more time with my family.
Tom says that he doesn\'t want to live like that anymore.
I don\'t want Tom anywhere near his classmates right now.
I don\'t want Tom to know that Mary and I went on a date.
Tom wanted me to let you know when Mary will be arriving.
I don't think I'd be able to forgive you if you did that.
This strawberry juice also contains bits of strawberries.
We waited for Tom all afternoon, but Tom never showed up.
Are you and Tom planning on getting married anytime soon?
The last time we had this problem, things got very messy.
You can't rely on medicine alone if you want to get well.
Manners and customs vary greatly from country to country.
Who would you want to be stranded on a small island with?
Which radio station do you usually listen to in your car?
Tom said that both he and Mary couldn't come to my party.
You're planning to go to Boston next weekend, aren't you?
